name: flux-challenge-robinvenneman-flux
description: Solving the flux challenge, with flux
author: Robin Venneman

scripts.build: browserify src/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 es2016 react ] ] -o dist/app.js
scripts.dev: watchify src/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 es2016 react ] ] -d -o dist/app.js
